response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for both of us. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending this offer to you at a price of $1,200,000. This price reflects the high quality and potential of the product, as well as the mutual benefits it could bring to our respective interests. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. Should you be interested in proceeding, please let me know, and we can discuss the details further.", "product_price": 1200000}
